summary: Cheerleading squads traveling on a bus to a state competition are kidnapped for ransom by former football players.

Bush|Hugh Brenneman|Marc Isaac|Mike Hanks|Betty Osco|Bill Whitman|Dave Gilbert|David Smilow|Robert Worms|Elyce Wakerman|Payton Reid|Nancy Osco|Andrew J. Kuehn|Floyd Peterson
title: The Great American Girl Robbery
